meanings.definition: A short novel or long short story.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading a novelette before bed.
meanings.sent2: The library had a collection of romantic novelettes.
meanings.sent3: The novelette she read had a surprising twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she delved into the novelette's world.
meanings.sent5: The novelette painted vivid pictures in her mind.

meanings.definition: A work of fiction that is longer than a short story but shorter than a novel.
meanings.sent1: He wrote a captivating novelette during his summer break.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore displayed a variety of intriguing novelettes.
meanings.sent3: The novelette about time travel made her laugh at the possibilities.
meanings.sent4: The author's words in the novelette danced off the pages.
meanings.sent5: The novelette left a lasting impression on her imagination.
